title: Act Of Defiance - Birth And The Burial (2015)ak
description:
Studio album by Act of Defiance
Released 	August 21, 2015
Recorded 	Ill-Fated Studio in Los Angeles, California; Dexter's Lab in Milford, Connecticut; ManShark in Southampton, Massachusetts
Genre 	Heavy metal, thrash metal, speed metal, melodic death metal
Length 	47:12
Label 	Metal Blade
Singles from Birth and the Burial

    "Throwback"
    Released: June 24, 2015
    "Refrain and Re-Fracture"
    Released: July 14, 2015[1]
    "Legion of Lies"
    Released: August 5, 2015

Birth and the Burial is the upcoming debut album by American heavy metal supergroup Act of Defiance. It is set for release on August 21, 2015 through Metal Blade Records.

A music video for the song "Throwback" was released on June 24, 2015, with another for "Legion of Lies" following on August 6, 2015.
